short_description: the cypress of charlotte is a senior care and assisted living facility based in charlotte, north carolina, united states.
long_description: that's why we're here. call 704.714.5568 for more information. here's a breakdown of what's included: home and building maintenance, water and sewer, utilities, wi-fi and cable, phone, landscape maintenance, stewart health center discount, building insurance, security, club activities, trash and garbage pickup, weekly linen service, scheduled transportation, and weekly housekeeping. what about transportation. the cypress is planned for an independent and active retirement. the cypress is owned by its members. the entire community, including the stewart health center, is operated on a not-for-profit basis. life care services corporation of des moines, iowa, manages the day-to-day operation of the cypress. the company is nationally recognized with over 50 years of experience and 140 communities nationwide. the stewart health center, which is medicare certified, offers short-term, long-term, and memory care services on the cypress campus. assisted living and home health services are also available for members living in their own residences.

short_description: the cypress of charlotte is a nursing & personal care services provider based in charlotte, north carolina, united states.
long_description: the cypress is charlotte's premier life plan community, sitting on 65 sun-kissed acres in the heart of beautiful south park. throughout the cypress' history, our goal has always been to give our residents the best of everything. that includes an inspired lifestyle filled with activities and amenities, a variety of wellness opportunities, world-class healthcare, and financial stability from owning a home. as a life plan community, the cypress is uniquely equipped to meet the different health care needs of its residents, from the most independent and able to those requiring more advanced levels of care. every detail surrounding our healthcare model has been carefully considered to best ensure that residents can continue to experience the rich, full lives they deserve, even as their medical needs change. located on campus, the stewart health center is a medicare-certified facility offering assisted living options, 24-hour skilled nursing care and dementia care for rehabilitative and long-term care programs, short-term recuperation and respite services for all cypress residents. when you work at the cypress, you can see the difference your efforts make. help or interact with a member once, and you've literally made a friend forever. if you're interested in doing important work in a supportive, employee-friendly environment, please explore our current job opportunities: https://eexs.fa.us2.oraclecloud.com/hcmui/candidateexperience/en/sites/cypressofcharlotte/requisitions?mode=location
